Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Type
property.value: Psychic Creature

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ All Aliens in the battle zone get "Slayer". (Whenever a creature that has "slayer" battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have Mother Alien (Gladly) in the battle zone, link it to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.value: Liquid People/Hunter

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Psychic Link—At the start of your turn, if you have Aqua Attack (BAGOOON Panzer) and Aqua Cascade (ZABUUUN Cruiser) in the battle zone, link them to this creature and flip this creature to its higher cost side. {HUNTING} (While battling, this creature gets +1000 power for each of your Hunters in the battle zone.) (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Race
property.value: Grand Devil

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ All spells cost 2 more to cast.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a number. Then look at your opponent's hand. For each card that costs the same as the chosen number, draw a card. ■ Put up to 2 water psychic creatures that have total cost 7 or less from your hyperspatial zone into the battle zone. (At the start of the game, psychic creatures aren't put into your deck and are put into your hyperspatial zone, and if a psychic creature is put into a zone other than the battle zone, they are returned there.)

property.name: Set

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Virus/Dragonoid

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

card.name: Tensai Janit of the Hidden Blade

property.name: Race
property.value: Cyber Lord/Shinobi

property.name: Rules
property.value: {NINJA STRIKE} 4 (Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, if you have 4 or more cards in your mana zone and if during that attack you didn't use a "Ninja Strike" ability, you may summon this Shinobi for no cost. At the end of that turn, put this Shinobi on the bottom of your deck.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose another creature in the battle zone that costs 3 or less and return it to its owner's hand.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Draw a card. Then if your opponent has 2 shields or less, draw 2 more cards.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Type
property.value: Evolution Creature

property.name: Race
property.value: Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Graveyard evolution—Choose a darkness creature in your graveyard and put this creature into the battle zone on top of that creature. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. This turn, that creature can't block.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Look at your opponent's hand and discard a spell from it.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, discard 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Set

property.name: Race
property.value: Splash Queen/Tyranno Drake

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ When this creature is destroyed, choose one of the following: ► Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand. ► Discard your hand and then draw the same number of cards that you discarded in this way.

property.name: Set
property.value: DMX-07 Duel Madness! Heroes Victory Pack: Mission Roar Wilder

property.name: Race
property.value: Fire Bird/Cyber Lord

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Whenever this creature attacks, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's an evolution creature, you may put it into your hand. Otherwise, put it on the bottom of your deck.
